ayas.arabic: حمٓ
ayas.translation: Ha Mim!
ayas.transliteration: ḥā mīm

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.arabic: تَنزِيلٌ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayas.translation: A revelation from the Beneficent, the Merciful Allah:
ayas.transliteration: tanzīlun minar raḥmānir raḥīm

ayas.arabic: كِتَـٰبٌ فُصِّلَتْ ءَايَـٰتُهُۥ قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: A Book of which the verses are made plain, an Arabic Quran for a people who know:
ayas.transliteration: kitābun fuṣṣilat āyātuhu qur-ānan `arabiyyal liqawmiy ya`lamūn

ayas.arabic: بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا فَأَعْرَضَ أَكْثَرُهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُونَ
ayas.translation: A herald of good news and a warner, but most of them turn aside so they hear not.
ayas.transliteration: bashīran wanadhīran fa-a`raḍa aktharuhum fahum lā yasma`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ قُلُوبُنَا فِىٓ أَكِنَّةٍ مِّمَّا تَدْعُونَآ إِلَيْهِ وَفِىٓ ءَاذَانِنَا وَقْرٌ وَمِنۢ بَيْنِنَا وَبَيْنِكَ حِجَابٌ فَٱعْمَلْ إِنَّنَا عَـٰمِلُونَ
ayas.translation: And they say: Our hearts are under coverings from that to which you call us, and there is a heaviness in our ears, and a veil hangs between us and you, so work, we too are working.
ayas.transliteration: waqālū qulūbunā fī akinnatim mimmā tad`ūnā ilayhi wafī ādhāninā waqrun wa min bayninā wabaynika ḥijābun fa`mal innanā `āmilūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ فَٱسْتَقِيمُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوهُ ۗ وَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُشْرِكِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: I am only a mortal like you; it is revealed to me that your Allah is one Allah, therefore follow the right way to Him and ask His forgiveness; and woe to the polytheists;
ayas.transliteration: qul innamā ana basharun mithlukum yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun fastaqīmū ilayhi wastaghfirūh ۗ wawaylul lil-mushrikīn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: (To) those who do not give poor-rate and they are unbelievers in the hereafter.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna lā yu-tūnaz zakāta wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
ayas.translation: (As for) those who believe and do good, they shall surely have a reward never to be cut off.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَكْفُرُونَ بِٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَرْضَ فِى يَوْمَيْنِ وَتَجْعَلُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayas.translation: Say: What! do you indeed disbelieve in Him Who created the earth in two periods, and do you set up equals with Him? That is the Lord of the Worlds.
ayas.transliteration: qul a-innakum latakfurūna bil ladhī khalaqal-arḍa fī yawmayni wataj`alūna lahu andādā ۚ dhālika rabbul `ālamīn

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ مِن فَوْقِهَا وَبَـٰرَكَ فِيهَا وَقَدَّرَ فِيهَآ أَقْوَٰتَهَا فِىٓ أَرْبَعَةِ أَيَّامٍ سَوَآءً لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ
ayas.translation: And He made in it mountains above its surface, and He blessed therein and made therein its foods, in four periods: alike for the seekers.
ayas.transliteration: waja`ala fīhā rawāsiya min fawqihā wabāraka fīhā waqaddara fīhā aqwātahā fī arba`ati ayyāmin sawā-an lissā-ilīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَهِىَ دُخَانٌ فَقَالَ لَهَا وَلِلْأَرْضِ ٱئْتِيَا طَوْعًا أَوْ كَرْهًا قَالَتَآ أَتَيْنَا طَآئِعِينَ
ayas.translation: Then He directed Himself to the heaven and it is a vapor, so He said to it and to the earth: Come both, willingly or unwillingly. They both said: We come willingly.
ayas.transliteration: thummas-tawā ilas samā-i wahiya dukhānun faqāla lahā walil-arḍi-tiyā ṭaw`an aw karhan qālatā ataynā ṭā-i`īn

ayas.arabic: فَقَضَىٰهُنَّ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَاتٍ فِى يَوْمَيْنِ وَأَوْحَىٰ فِى كُلِّ سَمَآءٍ أَمْرَهَا ۚ وَزَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَحِفْظًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
ayas.translation: So He ordained them seven heavens in two periods, and revealed in every heaven its affair; and We adorned the lower heaven with brilliant stars and (made it) to guard; that is the decree of the Mighty, the Knowing.
ayas.transliteration: faqaḍāhunna sab`a samāwātin fī yawmayni wa-awḥā fī kulli samā-in amrahā ۚ wazayyannas samā-ad dunyā bimaṣābīḥa waḥifẓā ۚ dhālika taqdīrul `azīzil `alīm

ayas.arabic: فَإِنْ أَعْرَضُوا۟ فَقُلْ أَنذَرْتُكُمْ صَـٰعِقَةً مِّثْلَ صَـٰعِقَةِ عَادٍ وَثَمُودَ
ayas.translation: But if they turn aside, then say: I have warned you of a scourge like the scourge of Ad and Samood.
ayas.transliteration: fa-in a`raḍū faqul andhartukum ṣā`iqatan mithla ṣā`iqati `ādin wathamūd

ayas.arabic: إِذْ جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلرُّسُلُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَوْ شَآءَ رَبُّنَا لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً فَإِنَّا بِمَآ أُرْسِلْتُم بِهِۦ كَـٰفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: When their apostles came to them from before them and from behind them, saying, Serve nothing but Allah, they said: If our Lord had pleased He would certainly have sent down angels, so we are surely unbelievers in that with which you are sent.
ayas.transliteration: idh jā-at humur rusulu min bayni aydīhim wa min khalfihim allā ta`budū illallāh ۖ qālū law shā-a rabbunā la-anzala malā-ikatan fa-innā bimā ursiltum bihi kāfirūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَمَّا عَادٌ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ ٱلْحَقِّ وَقَالُوا۟ مَنْ أَشَدُّ مِنَّا قُوَّةً ۖ أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَهُمْ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۖ وَكَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يَجْحَدُونَ
ayas.translation: Then as to Ad, they were unjustly proud in the land, and they said: Who is mightier in strength than we? Did they not see that Allah Who created them was mightier than they in strength, and they denied Our communications?
ayas.transliteration: fa-ammā `ādun fastakbarū fil-arḍi bighayril ḥaqqi waqālū man ashaddu minnā quwwah ۖ awalam yaraw annallāhal ladhī khalaqahum huwa ashaddu minhum quwwah ۖ wakānū bi-āyātinā yajḥadūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِىٓ أَيَّامٍ نَّحِسَاتٍ لِّنُذِيقَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْخِزْىِ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ أَخْزَىٰ ۖ وَهُمْ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
ayas.translation: So We sent on them a furious wind in unlucky days, that We may make them taste the chastisement of abasement in this world's life; and certainly the chastisement of the hereafter is much more abasing, and they shall not be helped.
ayas.transliteration: fa-arsalnā `alayhim rīḥan ṣarṣaran fī ayyāmin naḥisātin linudhīqahum `adhābal khizyi fil ḥayātid dunyā ۖ wala`adhābul-ākhirati akhzā ۖ wahum lā yunṣarūn

ayas.arabic: وَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَهَدَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَٱسْتَحَبُّوا۟ ٱلْعَمَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ فَأَخَذَتْهُمْ صَـٰعِقَةُ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْهُونِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: And as to Samood, We showed them the right way, but they chose error above guidance, so there overtook them the scourge of an abasing chastisement for what they earned.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ammā thamūdu fahadaynāhum fastaḥabbul `amā `alal-hudā fa-akhadhat-hum ṣā`iqatul `adhābil hūni bimā kānū yaksibūn

ayas.arabic: وَنَجَّيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: And We delivered those who believed and guarded (against evil).
ayas.transliteration: wanajjaynal ladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūn

ayas.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يُحْشَرُ أَعْدَآءُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
ayas.translation: And on the day that the enemies of Allah shall be brought together to the fire, then they shall be formed into groups.
ayas.transliteration: wayawma yuḥsharu a`dā-ullāhi ilan nāri fahum yūza`ūn

ayas.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا مَا جَآءُوهَا شَهِدَ عَلَيْهِمْ سَمْعُهُمْ وَأَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ وَجُلُودُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Until when they come to it, their ears and their eyes and their skins shall bear witness against them as to what they did.
ayas.transliteration: ḥattā idhā mā jā-ūhā shahida `alayhim sam`uhum wa-abṣāruhum wajulūduhum bimā kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لِجُلُودِهِمْ لِمَ شَهِدتُّمْ عَلَيْنَا ۖ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنطَقَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنطَقَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ خَلَقَكُمْ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: And they shall say to their skins: Why have you borne witness against us? They shall say: Allah Who makes everything speak has made us speak, and He created you at first, and to Him you shall be brought back.
ayas.transliteration: waqālū lijulūdihim lima shahidtum `alaynā ۖ qālū anṭaqanallāhul ladhī anṭaqa kulla shay-in wahuwa khalaqakum awwala marratin wa ilayhi turja`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَا كُنتُمْ تَسْتَتِرُونَ أَن يَشْهَدَ عَلَيْكُمْ سَمْعُكُمْ وَلَآ أَبْصَـٰرُكُمْ وَلَا جُلُودُكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن ظَنَنتُمْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَعْلَمُ كَثِيرًا مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And you did not veil yourselves lest your ears and your eyes and your skins should bear witness against you, but you thought that Allah did not know most of what you did.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā kuntum tastatirūna an yash-hada `alaykum sam`ukum walā abṣārukum walā julūdukum walākin ẓanantum annallāha lā ya`lamu kathīran mimmā ta`malūn

ayas.arabic: وَذَٰلِكُمْ ظَنُّكُمُ ٱلَّذِى ظَنَنتُم بِرَبِّكُمْ أَرْدَىٰكُمْ فَأَصْبَحْتُم مِّنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
ayas.translation: And that was your (evil) thought which you entertained about your Lord that has tumbled you down into perdition, so are you become of the lost ones.
ayas.transliteration: wadhālikum ẓannukumul ladhī ẓanantum birabbikum ardākum fa-aṣbaḥtum minal khāsirīn

ayas.arabic: فَإِن يَصْبِرُوا۟ فَٱلنَّارُ مَثْوًى لَّهُمْ ۖ وَإِن يَسْتَعْتِبُوا۟ فَمَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُعْتَبِينَ
ayas.translation: Then if they will endure, still the fire is their abode, and if they ask for goodwill, then are they not of those who shall be granted goodwill.
ayas.transliteration: fa-in yaṣbirū fan nāru mathwan lahum ۖ wa in yasta`tibū famā hum minal mu`tabīn

ayas.arabic: وَقَيَّضْنَا لَهُمْ قُرَنَآءَ فَزَيَّنُوا۟ لَهُم مَّا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَحَقَّ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقَوْلُ فِىٓ أُمَمٍ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ خَـٰسِرِينَ
ayas.translation: And We have appointed for them comrades so they have made fair-seeming to them what is before them and what is behind them, and the word proved true against them-- among the nations of the jinn and the men that have passed away before them-- that they shall surely be losers.
ayas.transliteration: waqayyaḍnā lahum quranā-a fazayyanū lahum mā bayna aydīhim wa mā khalfahum waḥaqqa `alayhimul qawlu fī umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal-ins ۖ innahum kānū khāsirīn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَا تَسْمَعُوا۟ لِهَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَٱلْغَوْا۟ فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَغْلِبُونَ
ayas.translation: And those who disbelieve say: Do not listen to this Quran and make noise therein, perhaps you may overcome.
ayas.transliteration: waqālal ladhīna kafarū lā tasma`ū lihādhal qur-āni wal ghaw fīhi la`allakum taghlibūn

ayas.arabic: فَلَنُذِيقَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا وَلَنَجْزِيَنَّهُمْ أَسْوَأَ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Therefore We will most certainly make those who disbelieve taste a severe punishment, and We will most certainly reward them for the evil deeds they used to do.
ayas.transliteration: falanudhīqannal ladhīna kafarū `adhāban shadīdan walanajziyannahum aswa-al ladhī kānū ya`malūn

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ أَعْدَآءِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّارُ ۖ لَهُمْ فِيهَا دَارُ ٱلْخُلْدِ ۖ جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يَجْحَدُونَ
ayas.translation: That is the reward of the enemies of Allah-- the fire; for them therein shall be the house of long abiding; a reward for their denying Our communications.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika jazā-u a`dā-illāhin nār ۖ lahum fīhā dārul khuld ۖ jazā-an bimā kānū bi-āyātinā yajḥadūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ رَبَّنَآ أَرِنَا ٱلَّذَيْنِ أَضَلَّانَا مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ نَجْعَلْهُمَا تَحْتَ أَقْدَامِنَا لِيَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلْأَسْفَلِينَ
ayas.translation: And those who disbelieve will say: Our Lord! show us those who led us astray from among the jinn and the men that we may trample them under our feet so that they may be of the lowest.
ayas.transliteration: waqālal ladhīna kafarū rabbanā arinal ladhayni aḍallānā minal jinni wal-insi naj`alhumā taḥta aqdāminā liyakūnā minal-asfalīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ تَتَنَزَّلُ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَلَّا تَخَافُوا۟ وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا۟ وَأَبْشِرُوا۟ بِٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: (As for) those who say: Our Lord is Allah, then continue in the right way, the angels descend upon them, saying: Fear not, nor be grieved, and receive good news of the garden which you were promised.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna qālū rabbunallāhu thummas-taqāmū tatanazzalu `alayhimul malā-ikatu allā takhāfū walā taḥzanū wa-abshirū bil jannatil latī kuntum tū`adūn

ayas.arabic: نَحْنُ أَوْلِيَآؤُكُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَفِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَا تَشْتَهِىٓ أَنفُسُكُمْ وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَا تَدَّعُونَ
ayas.translation: We are your guardians in this world's life and in the hereafter, and you shall have therein what your souls desire and you shall have therein what you ask for:
ayas.transliteration: naḥnu awliyā-ukum fil ḥayātid dunyā wafil-ākhirah ۖ walakum fīhā mā tashtahī anfusukum walakum fīhā mā tadda`ūn

ayas.arabic: نُزُلًا مِّنْ غَفُورٍ رَّحِيمٍ
ayas.translation: A provision from the Forgiving, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: nuzulan min ghafūrin raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَمَنْ أَحْسَنُ قَوْلًا مِّمَّن دَعَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا وَقَالَ إِنَّنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: And who speaks better than he who calls to Allah while he himself does good, and says: I am surely of those who submit?
ayas.transliteration: wa man aḥsanu qawlan mimman da`ā ilallāhi wa`amila ṣāliḥan waqāla innanī minal muslimīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا تَسْتَوِى ٱلْحَسَنَةُ وَلَا ٱلسَّيِّئَةُ ۚ ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ فَإِذَا ٱلَّذِى بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَهُۥ عَدَٰوَةٌ كَأَنَّهُۥ وَلِىٌّ حَمِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And not alike are the good and the evil. Repel (evil) with what is best, when lo! he between whom and you was enmity would be as if he were a warm friend.
ayas.transliteration: walā tastawil ḥasanatu walas sayyi-ah ۚ id-fa` bil latī hiya aḥsanu fa-idhal ladhī baynaka wabaynahu `adāwatun ka-annahu waliyyun ḥamīm

ayas.arabic: وَمَا يُلَقَّىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُوا۟ وَمَا يُلَقَّىٰهَآ إِلَّا ذُو حَظٍّ عَظِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And none are made to receive it but those who are patient, and none are made to receive it but those who have a mighty good fortune.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā yulaqqāhā illal ladhīna ṣabarū wa mā yulaqqāhā illā dhū ḥaẓẓin `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ نَزْغٌ فَٱسْتَعِذْ بِٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayas.translation: And if an interference of the Shaitan should cause you mischief, seek refuge in Allah; surely He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
ayas.transliteration: wa immā yanzaghannaka minash shayṭāni nazghun fasta`idh billāh ۖ innahu huwas samī`ul `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِ ٱلَّيْلُ وَٱلنَّهَارُ وَٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ ۚ لَا تَسْجُدُوا۟ لِلشَّمْسِ وَلَا لِلْقَمَرِ وَٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَهُنَّ إِن كُنتُمْ إِيَّاهُ تَعْبُدُونَ
ayas.translation: And among His signs are the night and the day and the sun and the moon; do not prostrate to the sun nor to the moon; and prostrate to Allah Who created them, if Him it is that you serve.
ayas.transliteration: wa min āyātihil laylu wan nahāru wash shamsu wal qamar ۚ lā tasjudū lishhamsi walā lilqamari wasjudū lillāhil ladhī khalaqahunna in kuntum iyyāhu ta`budūn

ayas.arabic: فَإِنِ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فَٱلَّذِينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ يُسَبِّحُونَ لَهُۥ بِٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَهُمْ لَا يَسْـَٔمُونَ ۩
ayas.translation: But if they are proud, yet those with your Lord glorify Him during the night and the day, and they are not tired.
ayas.transliteration: fa-inis-takbarū fal ladhīna `inda rabbika yusabbiḥūna lahu bil layli wan nahāri wahum lā yas-amūn ۩

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦٓ أَنَّكَ تَرَى ٱلْأَرْضَ خَـٰشِعَةً فَإِذَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَآءَ ٱهْتَزَّتْ وَرَبَتْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحْيَاهَا لَمُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: And among His signs is this, that you see the earth still, but when We send down on it the water, it stirs and swells: most surely He Who gives it life is the Giver of life to the dead; surely He has power over all things.
ayas.transliteration: wa min āyātihi annaka taral-arḍa khāshi`atan fa-idhā anzalnā `alayhal mā-ah-tazzat warabat ۚ innal ladhī aḥyāhā lamuḥyil mawtā ۚ innahu `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُلْحِدُونَ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا لَا يَخْفَوْنَ عَلَيْنَآ ۗ أَفَمَن يُلْقَىٰ فِى ٱلنَّارِ خَيْرٌ أَم مَّن يَأْتِىٓ ءَامِنًا يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Surely they who deviate from the right way concerning Our communications are not hidden from Us. What! is he then who is cast into the fire better, or he who comes safe on the day of resurrection? Do what you like, surely He sees what you do.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna yulḥidūna fī āyātinā lā yakhfawna `alaynā ۗ afaman yulqā fin nāri khayrun am man ya-tī āminan yawmal qiyāmah ۚ i'-malū mā shi-tum ۖ innahu bimā ta`malūna baṣīr

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱلذِّكْرِ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ ۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَكِتَـٰبٌ عَزِيزٌ
ayas.translation: Surely those who disbelieve in the reminder when it comes to them, and most surely it is a Mighty Book:
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna kafarū bidh dhikri lammā jā-ahum ۖ wa innahu lakitābun `azīz

ayas.arabic: لَّا يَأْتِيهِ ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَلَا مِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ ۖ تَنزِيلٌ مِّنْ حَكِيمٍ حَمِيدٍ
ayas.translation: Falsehood shall not come to it from before it nor from behind it; a revelation from the Wise, the Praised One.
ayas.transliteration: lā ya-tīhil bāṭilu min bayni yadayhi walā min khalfih ۖ tanzīlun min ḥakīmin ḥamīd

ayas.arabic: مَّا يُقَالُ لَكَ إِلَّا مَا قَدْ قِيلَ لِلرُّسُلِ مِن قَبْلِكَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو مَغْفِرَةٍ وَذُو عِقَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Naught is said to you but what was said indeed to the apostles before you; surely your Lord is the Lord of forgiveness and the Lord of painful retribution.
ayas.transliteration: mā yuqālu laka illā mā qad qīla lirrusuli min qablik ۚ inna rabbaka ladhū maghfiratin wadhū `iqābin alīm

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَانًا أَعْجَمِيًّا لَّقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا فُصِّلَتْ ءَايَـٰتُهُۥٓ ۖ ءَا۬عْجَمِىٌّ وَعَرَبِىٌّ ۗ قُلْ هُوَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ هُدًى وَشِفَآءٌ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَقْرٌ وَهُوَ عَلَيْهِمْ عَمًى ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُنَادَوْنَ مِن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
ayas.translation: And if We had made it a Quran in a foreign tongue, they would certainly have said: Why have not its communications been made clear? What! a foreign (tongue) and an Arabian! Say: It is to those who believe a guidance and a healing; and (as for) those who do not believe, there is a heaviness in their ears and it is obscure to them; these shall be called to from a far-off place.
ayas.transliteration: walaw ja`alnāhu qur-ānan a`jamiyyal laqālū lawlā fuṣṣilat āyātuh ۖ a-a`jamiyyun wa`arabiyy ۗ qul huwa lilladhīna āmanū hudan washifā-u ۖ wal ladhīna lā yu-minūna fī ādhānihim waqrun wahuwa `alayhim `amā ۚ ulā-ika yunādawna min makānin ba`īd

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ فَٱخْتُلِفَ فِيهِ ۗ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَفِى شَكٍّ مِّنْهُ مُرِيبٍ
ayas.translation: And certainly We gave the Book to Musa, but it has been differed about, and had not a word already gone forth from your Lord, judgment would certainly have been given between them; and most surely they are in a disquieting doubt about it.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsal kitāba fakhtulifa fīh ۗ walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laquḍiya baynahum ۚ wa innahum lafī shakkin minhu murīb

ayas.arabic: مَّنْ عَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَنْ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيْهَا ۗ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
ayas.translation: Whoever does good, it is for his own soul, and whoever does evil, it is against it; and your Lord is not in the least unjust to the servants.
ayas.transliteration: man `amila ṣāliḥan falinafsih ۖ wa man asā-a fa`alayhā ۗ wa mā rabbuka biẓallāmin lil`abīd

ayas.arabic: إِلَيْهِ يُرَدُّ عِلْمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ ۚ وَمَا تَخْرُجُ مِن ثَمَرَٰتٍ مِّنْ أَكْمَامِهَا وَمَا تَحْمِلُ مِنْ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلْمِهِۦ ۚ وَيَوْمَ يُنَادِيهِمْ أَيْنَ شُرَكَآءِى قَالُوٓا۟ ءَاذَنَّـٰكَ مَا مِنَّا مِن شَهِيدٍ
ayas.translation: To Him is referred the knowledge of the hour, and there come not forth any of the fruits from their coverings, nor does a female bear, nor does she give birth, but with His knowledge; and on the day when He shall call out to them, Where are (those whom you called) My associates? They shall say: We declare to Thee, none of us is a witness.
ayas.transliteration: ilayhi yuraddu `il-mus sā`ah ۚ wa mā takhruju min thamarātin min akmāmihā wa mā taḥmilu min unthā walā taḍa`u illā bi`il-mih ۚ wayawma yunādīhim ayna shurakā-ī qālū ādhannāka mā minnā min shahīd

ayas.arabic: وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَدْعُونَ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَظَنُّوا۟ مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٍ
ayas.translation: And away from them shall go what they called upon before, and they shall know for certain that there is no escape for them.
ayas.transliteration: waḍalla `anhum mā kānū yad`ūna min qabl ۖ waẓannū mā lahum min maḥīṣ

ayas.arabic: لَّا يَسْـَٔمُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلْخَيْرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٌ قَنُوطٌ
ayas.translation: Man is never tired of praying for good, and if evil touch him, then he is despairing, hopeless.
ayas.transliteration: lā yas-amul-insānu min du`ā-il khayri wa in massahush sharru faya-ūsun qanūṭ

ayas.arabic: وَلَئِنْ أَذَقْنَـٰهُ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتْهُ لَيَقُولَنَّ هَـٰذَا لِى وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةً وَلَئِن رُّجِعْتُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّىٓ إِنَّ لِى عِندَهُۥ لَلْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ فَلَنُنَبِّئَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٍ
ayas.translation: And if We make him taste mercy from Us after distress that has touched him, he would most certainly say: This is of me, and I do not think the hour will come to pass, and if I am sent back to my Lord, I shall have with Him sure good; but We will most certainly inform those who disbelieved of what they did, and We will most certainly make them taste of hard chastisement.
ayas.transliteration: wala-in adhaqnāhu raḥmatan minnā min ba`di ḍarrā-a massat-hu layaqūlanna hādhā lī wa mā aẓunnus sā`ata qā-imatan wala-in ruji`tu ilā rabbī inna lī `indahu lalḥusnā ۚ falanunabbi-annal ladhīna kafarū bimā `amilū walanudhīqannahum min `adhābin ghalīẓ

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَآ أَنْعَمْنَا عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ أَعْرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَذُو دُعَآءٍ عَرِيضٍ
ayas.translation: And when We show favor to man, he turns aside and withdraws himself; and when evil touches him, he makes lengthy supplications.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā an`amnā `alal-insāni a`raḍa wana-ā bijānibihi wa idhā massahush sharru fadhū du`ā-in `arīḍ

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِن كَانَ مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ كَفَرْتُم بِهِۦ مَنْ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنْ هُوَ فِى شِقَاقٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
ayas.translation: Say: Tell me if it is from Allah; then you disbelieve in it, who is in greater error than he who is in a prolonged opposition?
ayas.transliteration: qul ara aytum in kāna min `indillāhi thumma kafartum bihi man aḍallu mimman huwa fī shiqāqin ba`īd

ayas.arabic: سَنُرِيهِمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فِى ٱلْـَٔافَاقِ وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَهُمْ أَنَّهُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ أَوَلَمْ يَكْفِ بِرَبِّكَ أَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
ayas.translation: We will soon show them Our signs in the Universe and in their own souls, until it will become quite clear to them that it is the truth. Is it not sufficient as regards your Lord that He is a witness over all things?
ayas.transliteration: sanurīhim āyātinā fil-āfāqi wafī anfusihim ḥattā yatabayyana lahum annahul ḥaqq ۗ awalam yakfi birabbika annahu `alā kulli shay-in shahīd

ayas.arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ فِى مِرْيَةٍ مِّن لِّقَآءِ رَبِّهِمْ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ مُّحِيطٌۢ
ayas.translation: Now surely they are in doubt as to the meeting of their Lord; now surely He encompasses all things.
ayas.transliteration: alā innahum fī miryatim min liqā-i rabbihim ۗ alā innahu bikulli shay-in muḥīṭ
